thread.title: Prime Gaming: four free games available from today to start the weekend
thread.title_full: Prime Gaming: four free games available from today to start the weekend

author: David Fernández
title: Prime Gaming: four free games available from today to start the weekend
text:
Get 4 free games today with Prime Gaming.
More stories in the category News
| Don't miss anything and follow us on Google News! |
Amazon is once again celebrating the weekend with a new batch of free games for Prime Gaming subscribers, and this time there’s something for everyone. From space adventures to cult classics, service members can expand their digital library without spending an extra euro.
As always, the games can be claimed throughout the day on various platforms linked to Prime Gaming, including the Amazon Games App, GOG, and the Microsoft Store. Once redeemed, they will remain in your account forever, even if you cancel your subscription.
Free Prime Gaming games available today
-
Another World: 20th Anniversary Edition (GOG Code) — The sci-fi classic returns with improved graphics, remastered sound, and support for modern systems. A gem that marked a before and after in narrative video games of the 90s.
-
Fallout 76 (Microsoft Store) — Explore the West Virginia Wasteland in this multiplayer installment of the Fallout universe, set in the early days of humanity after the nuclear apocalypse.
-
Fort Solis (GOG Code) — A third-person space thriller with a cinematic atmosphere and an unsettling tone. Ideal for fans of slow-paced stories and darker science fiction.
-
Dark City: Kyiv Collector’s Edition (Amazon Games App) — Paranormal mysteries and puzzles await in a special edition set in the magical city of Kyiv, with additional content and exclusive art.
Suscríbirse
All you have to do is head over to Prime Gaming and grab the ones that catch your eye before they disappear. It’s one of those days when it’s worth taking a look and expanding your library without thinking too much.
